A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I've seen all the star wars movies\, I'm 23 years old\, as a kid I only saw the brand new trilogy. 

I never wanted to watch a new hope\, empire and ROTJ\, Then the day came 2005 it was the last star wars movie I watched the the old trilogy and i was blown away that feeling was truly amazing. 

I loved the force awakens and rogue one!!

Now when I saw the last Jedi I went in expecting it to be like empire\, it's not a bad thing.

I would of still enjoyed it. What rian Johnson plus cast and crew have created here is a masterpiece I've never been on the edge of my seat wondering what's going to happen in the next moment. 

Mark Hamil was brilliant in his role he should be nominated for an Oscar I'm not even kidding it was Oscar worthy. the way he acted is unlike any actor I've ever seen. it must of been years in the making for him to get prepared for such an amazing role.

daisy Ridly and Adam drive truly delivered brillant roles with such emotions you wouldn't think it was possible. 

Carrie Fisher role in the movie was quite something I'm not just saying this because of her passing\, she was excellent I hope episode 9 will have some sort of input from her. 

The last Jedi is the best star wars to date.

I can't understand how life long fans can say this film was bad\, surly you would want a brand new story and not the same story over and over again.

As a fan I'm very excited for episode 9 and rian Johnson trilogy as he offeres brillant ideas and stories to the star wars universe.
